title: 不着急，可以慢慢来【我去！没人来了！】
author: 以太的小神
txt_content:
问：【1】50分
           1.2.5大航海mod和什么mod冲突【本人无法变船】？
          【2】50分
           在回答了上一问后，怎么删除mod?

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
Known Incompatibilities
Not Enough Items. Some people reported that Minecraft crashes when this mod is installed.
Better than Wolves. As BTW's authors says "The Mod That is Incompatible With Everything!!!" :) Better than wolves doesn't seem to work well with Minecraft-Forge-Based mods
Single Player Commands. Weird things happen when this mod is installed, such as the player and ship sinking into the ground. Do not use this mod together with Ships&Boats!
Noppe's Custom NPCs. Some users reported this mod doesn't work well with Ship&Boats
Dynamic Elevators. Elevators do not work in ships
MC Patcher. Doesn't work well with Ships&Boats. Use Optifine instead
Mystcraft. Doesn't work well with Ships&Boats. Avoid installing them both together

replies.author: 以太的小神
replies.txt_content: 【自己先说两句】1，头像是日本的，心是中国的。2，我贴不沉！不沉我贴！

replies.author: Sky、果冻
replies.txt_content:
以太的小神 发表于 2012-10-3 20:41 
【自己先说两句】1，头像是日本的，心是中国的。2，我贴不沉！不沉我贴！
头像说明不了问题= =我的也是日本的，看日本动漫和爱国没关系

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
上面是回答你第一个问题，你问“什么mod”，我上面加粗的部分就是答案。mod都是国外作品，玩mod的人不可能连mod原名都不懂，我也没义务给我见过的每一个mod都翻译一个中文名。对于不懂英文的，请至少记住你玩过的mod的英文原名，不要只看中文。
英文不认真对待就算了，“【本人无法变船】”你可以更认真点对待你的中文

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
我只是小小的版主，你们才是上帝。但上帝也不能傲娇。

那么你的问题解决了么
